channel.title: X-Realm 508 server development
channel.description:
[b] Pictures soon [/b] sorry
Hello and welcome to the X-Realm 508 development thread. The X-Realm project was started a few months ago being coded on and off by the server programmer Blake and I. We offically decided to start up the server but we need some help, heres what you can apply for and how.
Gfx creator Client coder Possibly a forum coder
heres how you can apply
[b]Name: Age: Postion: How much experience: Other ways you can benefit us: [/b]
We currently working on Fight pits All working skills Duel arena with staking. alot of minigames.. ect.
Please apply, thank you.
